response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and my proposal aims to strike a fair balance between our interests. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its true value, while still allowing me to receive a substantial return on my investment. I believe this price is equitable and reflective of the quality and importance of the product. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
